problem_solving.title: Solution-Oriented
problem_solving.description: Breaking complex problems into simple, efficient, and scalable logic. I don't just write code, I solve tasks.

quality.description: Committed to writing readable, well-documented code and delivering polished, consistent user experiences.

user_focus.title: User-Centric Mindset
user_focus.description: Prioritizing accessibility and usability to create products that people actually love using.

reliability.title: Reliable & Scalable
reliability.description: Building robust systems that are easy to maintain, test, and grow over the long term.

treenity.name: Treenity LLC
treenity.description: Developed an interactive apartment configurator and Telegram MiniApps. Implemented complex UI interactions, smooth animations, and data-driven interfaces with Telegram API integration (bot and MiniApp).

kvarum.name: Kvarum.app
kvarum.description: Developed an event management platform for speakers and attendees. Worked extensively with calendars, virtual lists, and real-time data loading via WebSockets.

sandvik.name: Sandvik
sandvik.position: IT Infrastructure Manager / Inhouse Software Developer
sandvik.description: 12 years managing enterprise IT infrastructure, including experience leading a small team. Developed internal web applications for corporate data processing and reporting, bridging IT operations with business needs.
